item.title: Hack The Box: RedPanda Writeup | Easy
item.description: Hack The Box: RedPanda Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the easy difficulty machine “RedPanda” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.227.207 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.227.207 -> [22,8080] $ nmap -p22,8080 -sCV 10.129.227.207 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-02 21:19 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.227.207 Host is up (0.
